    const int N = 300000;
    ll Height [N];
    ll DP [N];
    int main(){
            //freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
            csl;
            cin >> n;
            rep (i, n)
                    cin >> Height[i];
            rep (i, n)
                    DP[i] = (1LL << 60LL);
            DP[0] = 0;
            rep (i, n){
                    for (ll j = 1; i - j >= 0; j <<= 1){
                            DP[i] = min(DP[i], DP[i - j] + abs(Height[i] - Height[i - j]));
                    }
            }
            cout << DP[n - 1] << '\n';
